Name: PTRL Stockcar Edition
About the game: PTRL Stockcar Edition is a challenging arcade racer set in a fictional racing series of the 80s Features 3 different regions (Dustville, Snakemile, Concrete Beach) 9 track layouts (road, reverse and oval) 3 cars / 12 paint schemes (M80, M82, M88) Single & Multiplayer (Several players can play at the same time via telephone line!) Double resolution of a game boy Complex AI system (N.O.B.R.A.I.N. v1.32)
